thread.title: Official Unified TWRP Build Available for the Xiaomi Mi Max (Hydrogen/Helium)
thread.title_full: Official Unified TWRP Build Available for the Xiaomi Mi Max (Hydrogen/Helium)

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Official Unified TWRP Build Available for the Xiaomi Mi Max (Hydrogen/Helium)
text: Flashing different files for different variants of the same device can be annoying, as you have to double check what you’re flashing every time so you don’t end up with a soft brick. That’s why XDA Senior Member TheStrix has posted an official build of TWRP which can be flashed on both variants of the Xiaomi Mi Mix (Hydrogen and Helium).
